entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
